big_scroller.heading: Be ready for a new beginning
big_scroller.title: Our inspiration and solutions at IKEA can help you bring your ideas to life.

big_scroller.heading: Affordable living room sets starting at Rs.35,970
big_scroller.title: Make this multifunctional space that meets all your needs without breaking the bank.

big_scroller.heading: Last chance to buy
big_scroller.title: These products will be out of the range soon.

big_scroller.heading: Affordable bedroom sets starting at Rs.14,999
big_scroller.title: Why not match your bed to other furniture in the room for a cohesive look?

big_scroller.heading: Furniture under Rs.2999
big_scroller.title: Affordable furniture to create a space of your own

real_products.main_title: A soft cushion cover that pops up in every room
real_products.main_description: Whether you’re in need of a soft layer for your armchair, comfy support for your head when in bed or a dash of colour to your sofa, the SANELA cushion cover envelops you in equal style. Made from cotton velvet, the SANELA cushion cover can add a sense of dimension and depth to your bed or sofa arrangement, not to mention, the material is soft to the touch. Mix and match this trendy cushion cover with patterned cushions for a varied look, or keep the solid-colour theme at the forefront, since this product comes in a wide range of colours that you can chose from.

real_products.main_title: Hide your TV screen in an art gallery
real_products.main_description: A big TV is all good, but that doesn’t mean it has to become the centrepiece of the room. Or even the wall. Letting a wall-mounted monitor blend in by with framed art makes it all but go away – until it’s time for it to shine bright.

Easily finding what you need makes cooking much more enjoyable. Like with this solid aspen spice rack keeping everything you need for seasoning perfectly organised and always at hand. Any leftover space can be used for your latest cookbook purchase.

This spacious shoe cabinet has got enough drawers for everyone to keep a few pairs of shoes by the door, so you’ll always be ready for any last minute outfit changes. Combine it with a pegboard to keep keys and small items handy by the door.
